comments.Comment:
Enum member names should be fully uppercase to follow naming conventions and maintain consistency.

Suggestion : V7_7_PREVIEW_1 = "7.7-preview.1"

See: https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/python_design.html#python-models-enum-name-uppercase

Optional parameters in service methods should be specified as keyword-only.
Suggestion : def roll_secret(self, name: str, *, content_type: Optional[str] = ..., enabled: Optional[bool] = ..., expires_on: Optional[datetime] = ..., not_before: Optional[datetime] = ..., tags: Optional[Dict[str, str]] = ..., **kwargs: Any) -> KeyVaultSecret
See: https://azure.github.io/azure-sdk/python_implementation.html#python-codestyle-optional-args
Optional parameters in model constructors should be declared as keyword-only.
